thread.section_title: Flatmates.com.au Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flatmates.com.au | flatmates.com.au
thread.title: Kate

author: Kate
title: Kate
text: I created a listing and within two days had found exactly the kind of place that I was looking at for less than I was expecting to pay. The notifications of listings that match yours provide an immediacy and allows you to take advantage of offers at short notice. The ability to be contacted based on your listing had me 8 offers for rooms within those two days. It was great and would definitely use if required in the future.
